name: Chizuru-MirrorBot
description: A Telegram bot for streaming Telegram files to the web.

env.name: ENV
env.description: Set this to True if you don't want the bot to crash.

env.name: APP_NAME
env.description: Copy and paste the app name used for the bot.

env.name: BIN_CHANNEL
env.description: The BIN Channel ID. Refer to the readme for more information.

env.name: SLEEP_THRESHOLD
env.description: Floodwait Sleep timer. Refer to the readme for more information.

env.name: WORKERS
env.description: Number of workers to be assigned. Refer to the readme for more information.

env.name: PORT
env.description: Port for the webapp to listen to. Refer to the readme for more information.

env.name: NO_PORT
env.description: If you don't want your port to be displayed.

env.name: BIND_ADDRESS
env.description: Refer to the readme for more information.

env.name: HAS_SSL
env.description: Set to True if SSL is enabled.

env.name: FQDN
env.description: Refer to the readme for more information.
